page.title: 11WE LIKE RIDING HORSES
page.content: Our names are Amber and Kim.We go horse riding a lot but we do not like going through the town in the Summer, because there are always holiday makers about and they do not know any rules of the road.We ride ponies as we are too small for the larger horses.We ride over the Torrs and through the Black Forest,near Comyn Farm,where the stables are.Kim has a pony and I am hoping to get a pony for the Winter. When we ride,we must wear a riding hat in case of accidents.Before we go rid- ing,we always groom our ponies,other- wise they will be itchy and uncomfort- able.Then we put the bridle and saddle on the pony.When we return from our ride we remove the saddle,rub the pony down and lead the pony to the field to graze.If it is too cold,the ponies are taken to a cosy warm stable instead.We are lucky to ride in such lovely land.
